movie_title: Young women on social media ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: How do young women experience the online world? For audio and transcript downloads, a quiz and a lis

vocabulary.definition: a formal discussion on a particular topic in a public meeting or legislative assembly, in which opposing arguments are put forward
vocabulary.example: The politicians engaged in a heated debate over the new law.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the most intense or exciting part of something
vocabulary.example: The climactic scene of the movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.

vocabulary.definition: casual or unconstrained conversation or reports about other people, typically involving details that are not confirmed as true
vocabulary.example: She heard some gossip about her colleague spreading false rumors.

vocabulary.definition: a sudden cry or remark expressing surprise, strong emotion, or pain
vocabulary.example: She let out an exclamation of joy when she received the good news.

vocabulary.definition: having or showing the capacity to become or develop into something in the future
vocabulary.example: With proper training, she could reach her full potential as a musician.

vocabulary.definition: showing or displaying anger, excitement, or strong emotion
vocabulary.example: The discussion became heated as different opinions clashed.
